page.title: 171ST URSWICK & ALDINGHAM CUBS
page.content: We meet at Urswick Church Hall every Monday, from 6:30 to 8:00pm.There are seven sixes in our pack, each six is named by a different colour, I am in the red six. We play games,make some things out of wood and do badge work. I have passed my home help, athletes, campers, explorers and swimmers badges and my bronze arrow. I have been on 2 camps, Littledale near Lancaster and Lords Wood in Torver. I have also been on 2 day trips by train. One was to London, the other one was to York. We sometimes go to Scout Wood,Urswick where we have barbecues. We eat hot dogs in buns and play games like the blind trail, tracking and the bar cross. It is a mile and a half from Scales where I live to Urswick, as there are no buses running at that time our parents take turns at tran- sporting us there and back by car.
